Spawn of Sarachnis are spiders summoned by Sarachnis during the fight against her. The blue one attacks with magic and the orange one attacks with melee.

'''Spawn of Sarachnis''' are [[spider]]s summoned by [[Sarachnis]] during the fight against her. The blue one attacks with magic and the orange one attacks with melee.
